name: Data Escape (John)
description:
Made for a Game Jam - Mini Jam 101: Limit

Try your best to escape from the Datascape as quickly as you can.

A game inspired from sliding puzzles (despite the fact I'm terrible at those LMAO):

the goal is to move the tiles that make up the dungeon and move accross it to reach the end of it. There's a time limit as well and once it reaches zero is game over. 

Controls:

  • Movement: WASD
  • Open map: M
  • Click tiles: left mouse button
  • Move tiles: click on an empty spot after selecting the tile to move
